name: Simon The Lumberjack
description:
Simon The Lumberjack is a Survival game where you have to fight against the time and difficulties of a lumberjack in order to set up your dwelling in a tropical and paradisiac forest.

Build a magnificent house by chopping wood in the woods, but be careful, you are not as powerful as you think and something could go wrong!

Credits:

Jhone Roger- Programmer
